title: Renault
description: French automobile manufacturer Renault was hit by the ransomware, causing some production sites to halt operations.

title: Télécom Paris
description: Télécom Paris, one of the top French public institutions of higher education and research of engineering in France, was infected by the ransomware.

title: SNCF
description: The French National Railway Corporation, SNCF, was affected by the WannaCry attack but operations were not disrupted.

title: Saint-Gobain
description: Saint-Gobain, a French multinational corporation, reported being a victim of the attack.

title: JCDecaux
description: JCDecaux, the largest outdoor advertising corporation in the world, was hit by the ransomware.

title: Groupe PSA
description: Groupe PSA, a French multinational manufacturer of automobiles and motorcycles, was affected by the WannaCry attack.

title: Legrand
description: Legrand, a French industrial group historically based in Limoges in the Limousin region, was infected by the ransomware.

title: Alstom
description: Alstom, a French multinational company operating worldwide in rail transport markets, was hit by the ransomware.

title: Bouygues
description: Bouygues, a French industrial group, was affected by the WannaCry attack.

title: Thales Group
description: Thales Group, a French multinational company that designs and builds electrical systems, reported being a victim of the attack.
